mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.name ,t.kind ,t.pic ,t.location
,t.order_no ,t.user_id ,(select login_name from ${userDB}.tstd_user tu where tu.user_id=t.user_id) as login_name ,t.site_code ,t.status
,t.updater ,t.update_datetime ,t.remark ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post_talk tpt inner join tforum_post tp on tpt.post_code = tp.code where tp.plate_code = t.code and tpt.type = '1') as dz_count ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_comment tc inner join tforum_post tp on tc.post_code = tp.code where tp.plate_code = t.code and tc.status in('B','D')) as pl_count
,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post tp where tp.plate_code = t.code and tp.status in('B','D')) as post_count ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post tp where tp.plate_code = t.code) as all_post_count ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post tp where tp.plate_code = t.code and date(tp.publish_datetime) = curdate() and tp.status in('B','D')) as today_post_count ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post tp where tp.plate_code = t.code and tp.location='A') as zd_count ,(SELECT count(1) from tforum_post tp where tp.plate_code = t.code and tp.location='B') as jh_count FROM tforum_plate t
ORDER BY t.order_no asc, t.code DESC
